languages.text: "Несомненно, сопровождая их отбытие на планету пламенными вдохновляющими речами?" {n}Теодора устало вздыхает.{/n} "Я никогда не верила в силу пропаганды. Она годится только для самого дурного положения — когда люди должны умирать во чье-то имя, а не побеждать и добиваться своего".

traits.locale_text: "Несомненно, сопровождая их отбытие на планету пламенными вдохновляющими речами?" {n}Теодора устало вздыхает.{/n} "Я никогда не верила в силу пропаганды. Она годится только для самого дурного положения — когда люди должны умирать во чье-то имя, а не побеждать и добиваться своего".

languages.text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, сопровождая их отбытие на планету пламенными вдохновляющими речами?" {n}Теодора устало вздыхает.{/n} "Я никогда не верила в силу пропаганды. Она годится только для самого дурного положения — когда люди должны умирать во чье-то имя, а не побеждать и добиваться своего".

traits.locale_text: "No doubt with you inspiring them with passionate speeches as the next crew departs for the planet?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

"No doubt with you inspiring them with passionate speeches as the next crew departs for the planet?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

"No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

"No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

"No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

languages.text: “毫无疑问，你会用充满激情的演说，激励每位离开的船员吧？”{n}西奥多拉疲惫地叹了口气。{/n}“我从来都不相信宣传的力量，因为它只有在最糟糕的情况下才会奏效。这种时候，通常都是你希望人们以谁的名义去死，而不是为了让他们获得胜利或实现目标。”
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，你会用充满激情的演说，激励每位离开的船员吧？”{n}西奥多拉疲惫地叹了口气。{/n}“我从来都不相信宣传的力量，因为它只有在最糟糕的情况下才会奏效。这种时候，通常都是你希望人们以谁的名义去死，而不是为了让他们获得胜利或实现目标。”

languages.text: «Y no me cabe duda de que dedicarías un discurso apasionado a cada tripulación al enviarla, ¿verdad?». {n}Theodora suspira, cansada.{/n} «Nunca he confiado en el poder de la propaganda. Su eficacia solo es fiable en las peores situaciones: cuando lo que necesitas es que la gente muera por una causa y no que triunfe y prevalezca».
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

traits.locale_text: «Y no me cabe duda de que dedicarías un discurso apasionado a cada tripulación al enviarla, ¿verdad?». {n}Theodora suspira, cansada.{/n} «Nunca he confiado en el poder de la propaganda. Su eficacia solo es fiable en las peores situaciones: cuando lo que necesitas es que la gente muera por una causa y no que triunfe y prevalezca».

languages.text: 「間違いなく、情熱的なスピーチで新たに出発する乗組員を鼓舞するでしょう？」{n}シオドーラは疲れたようにため息をついた。{/n}「私はプロパガンダの力を信じたことは一度もない。プロパガンダが効果的なのは最悪の状況下だけ。それは人に誰かの名によって死んでもらいたいときであって、勝利や成功を望むときではない」
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いなく、情熱的なスピーチで新たに出発する乗組員を鼓舞するでしょう？」{n}テオドラは疲れたようにため息をついた。{/n}「私はプロパガンダの力を信じたことは一度もありません。プロパガンダに効果があるのは最悪の状況だけです。つまり、勝利や達成ではなく、誰かの名の下に人々に死んでもらうことを望む場合です」
「間違いなく、情熱的なスピーチで新たに出発する乗組員を鼓舞するでしょう？」{n}シオドーラは疲れたようにため息をついた。{/n}「私はプロパガンダの力を信じたことは一度もない。プロパガンダが効果的なのは最悪の状況下だけ。それは人に誰かの名によって死んでもらいたいときであって、勝利や成功を望むときではない」

languages.text: « En motivant chaque nouvelle équipe en partance avec des discours enflammés, j'imagine ? {n}demande Théodora, puis elle soupire.{/n} Je n'ai jamais cru aux vertus de la propagande. Elle n'est efficace que dans les situations les plus désastreuses : lorsque l'on souhaite que des gens meurent au nom de quelqu'un, pas qu'ils triomphent. »
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

traits.locale_text: « En motivant chaque nouvelle équipe en partance avec des discours enflammés, j'imagine ? {n}demande Théodora, puis elle soupire.{/n} Je n'ai jamais cru aux vertus de la propagande. Elle n'est efficace que dans les situations les plus désastreuses : lorsque l'on souhaite que des gens meurent au nom de quelqu'un, pas qu'ils triomphent. »

languages.text: "Und Ihr würdet jede neue Crew mit einer leidenschaftlichen Ansprache inspirieren, richtig?" {n}Theodora seufzt müde.{/n} "Ich habe nie an die Macht von Propaganda geglaubt. Sie ist nur unter schlimmsten Bedingungen effektiv – wenn Leute für jemanden sterben sollen, nicht wenn es um Arbeit und Erfolg geht."
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr würdet jede neue Crew mit einer leidenschaftlichen Ansprache inspirieren, richtig?" {n}Theodora seufzt müde.{/n} "Ich habe nie an die Macht von Propaganda geglaubt. Sie ist nur unter schlimmsten Bedingungen effektiv – wenn Leute für jemanden sterben sollen, nicht wenn es um Arbeit und Erfolg geht."

languages.text: "Yola çıkan her yeni ekibe de tutkulu konuşmalarla ilham verirdin kuşkusuz." {n}Theodora bıkkınlıkla iç geçiriyor.{/n} "Propagandanın gücüne hiç inanmadım. Sadece en kötü koşullarda etkilidir. İnsanların birinin adına ölmesini istediğinde yani. Galip gelmeleri veya başarmaları için değil."
languages.original_text: "No doubt, inspiring each new departing crew with passionate speeches?" {n}Theodora sighs wearily.{/n} "I have never believed in the power of propaganda. It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."

Sadece en kötü koşullarda etkilidir. İnsanların birinin adına ölmesini istediğinde yani. Galip gelmeleri veya başarmaları için değil."

It is only effective in the worst of circumstances — when you want people to die in someone's name, not prevail and achieve."
